item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:15 Chances: LYFT seems to be thriving in the growing rideshare market, buoyed by competitive pricing and cost-cutting measures. The company has enlisted Oracle and Nielsen to provide brands more precise insights amid the rollout of richer ad formats. LYFT’s estimated fair value is US$35.

item.title: KHC
item.description: score:44 Chances: The company is set to release its fourth quarter and full year 2023 financial results, providing an opportunity for investors to assess its performance. Kraft Heinz has a strong presence in the US, Canada, and international markets, with popular brands like Velveeta and Oscar Meyer.
